title: IP bug, plz help
body:
This bug is kinda annoying, I want to buy a champion shard and it says i have 1794 ip.
It wouldn't let me buy it. So when I go to the runes, it says my balance after buying a 820 rune is 742.
820+742= 1562. So it is showing my ip as 232 more than it actually is.
plz help

replies.body:
This may be an issue with the updated client.  Log back onto the legacy version to fix up your balance:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
